content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition to recognition via Innovation Program, we always endorse people going extra mile, and staying on the account to become subject matter experts.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have developed a set of badges to recognize for your efforts and tenure:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":681567,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/57caf39a-5ef8-4f82-959d-f36e11f26a02/09 - Account badges@2x.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/57caf39a-5ef8-4f82-959d-f36e11f26a02/09 - Account badges@2x.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"09 - Account badges@2x.png\",\"name\":\"09 - Account badges@2x.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"57caf39a-5ef8-4f82-959d-f36e11f26a02\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029.0103759765625,\"height\":460.61870488477405},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
